A short attention span, a capacity for deception and self-deception, and impulsivity lead Trump down paths which are far from optimal for the country or his own narrow objective of managing the crisis engulfing his fledgling presidency.

His IQ may be, as he says, "one of the highest," but in practice his brain often ejaculates prematurely, spewing ill-considered statements before gathering all the facts and thinking through the ramifications.
Trump's early morning tweets — Saturday's and those of other days — are a striking reflection of all of these deficiencies coming together.
